attributes.action: You want BENEFITS....Time to earn them!
attributes.additional_details:
A "claim benefit" lifestyle is part of todays modern society and seen as an easy route in life.

People are to quick to claim what benefits they are entitled to but do not try and get out of this way of life.

Rent, council tax paid for and then money in their pockets.....WHY WOULD YOU WORK!!

This petition is to make the govenrment introduce a way of earning your benefits.

If you are on benefits for a long, sustained period of time with no employment then we should bring into place a system as where people earn their beneifts.

10 - 15 hours of community service to earn your JSA!

Roads are there to be cleaned, Graffiti removed etc.

Taking away benefits is not the answer but earning them is!
